===Conjunction===
{{zh-con}}

# [[even if]] (The verb of the following part of the sentence will be preceded by {{zh-l|也}})
#: {{zh-x|'''就是''' 下雨，我們 '''也''' 要 去。|'''Even if''' it rains, we shall go.}}
#: {{zh-x|'''就是''' 讓 她 來，'''也''' 晚 了。|'''Even if''' she comes, it will be too late.}}
# [[even]]
#: {{zh-x|就是 現在，他 的 步子 還是 很 壯健 有力 的。|'''Even''' now he walked with a vigorous step.}}
# (emphasis) [[just]], [[really]]
#: {{zh-x|我 從不 吃 菠菜。我 '''就是''' 不 喜歡 那 味兒{r}。|I never eat spinach. I '''just''' don't like the taste.}}
# [[like]], in the same way as

====Usage notes====
{{lang|zh|就是……}}{{zh-l|也}} is used to express "even if" in case of a hypothetical statement. This construction is the same as {{zh-l|即使}}{{lang|zh|……也}}, {{zh-l|即便}}{{lang|zh|……也}}, {{zh-l|縱使}}{{lang|zh|……也}}, {{zh-l|哪怕}}{{lang|zh|……也}} and {{zh-l|就算}}{{lang|zh|……也}}. There are differences with the last two: {{lang|zh|就算}} gives a feeling that the hypothesis has little chance of being realized, while {{lang|zh|哪怕}} is stronger.

If the statement is not hypothetical, {{zh-l|雖然}}{{lang|zh|……|sc=Hani}}{{zh-l|但是}} is used instead.
